name: FLETA
description: FLETA describes itself as a public blockchain platform that also provides technology and business support services to blockchain projects. Designed with the goal of creating the most developer-friendly environment that is scalable, efficient and cost-effective, FLETA aims to accelerate the mass adoption of blockchain technology. Its technology stack includes an independent multi-chain structure, block redesign, LEVEL Tree validation, parallel sharding, and a proprietary consensus algorithm (Proof-of-Formulation - PoF). Additionally, FLETA aims to enhance interoperability by enabling projects that are built and issued on other mainnets to provide their services on FLETA's service chain while maintaining their existing mainnets.
